item.title: The Hunger Games - GFDJFIBGFSOG
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:74, topic:437347”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=540054.msg3957130#msg3957130 date=1332876807]

Proof that the society is still fucked:

http://wonderwall.msn.com/movies/hunger-games-cast-subjected-to-racist-attacks-in-shocking-tweets-1673504.story?ocid=todww11

Wow… I’m pretty sure in the book, Collins said everyone from 11 is black. And saying that because Rue is black ruined the movie makes me mad that I am born in the generation that I am.
[/quote]
Ikr. Like who the fuck cares about skin colors these days. As long as you’re not a fucking terrorist (not associating any race) I’m cool with you.

The actress playing Katniss is quite a fit bird. Check out X-Men: First Class, it’s also great.

I don’t think she’s that fine. The actress from “Clash of the Titans” that gets resurrected in the end is fineeeee.[/quote]

I said basically the same thing 3 weeks ago.

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:28, topic:435846”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=538567.msg3940776#msg3940776 date=1331406431]

Read a book if you’re looking for storylines. (Hunger games books are 3 out of the 4 books I’ve actually enjoyed reading in my life).

Isnt there a movie coming out for the book? I bet they screwed it up. I loved those books.
[/quote]

Yeah. But it actually looks pretty good. I just wish they picked someone a little more attractive to play Katniss.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: The Hunger Games - GFDJFIBGFSOG
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:68, topic:437347”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=540054.msg3955849#msg3955849 date=1332737812]

A story based on fights to the death shouldn’t be PG-13, but I do realize that the book is mainly read by lower grades and in result the movie’s sales is produced by them. I never said it was a terrible movie, it was good. Just small details are left out.

I think the way she got the mockingjay pin from Greasy Sae instead of Madge was a big detail.

wha…? thats a big deal, because doesn’t Madge die in the last book?
[/quote]

…Put a spoiler warning or something idiot[/quote]
fix’d

Read full topic

item.title: The Hunger Games - GFDJFIBGFSOG
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Stupit, post:59, topic:437347”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=540054.msg3954896#msg3954896 date=1332649534]

Just watched, didn’t like it. Not worth dling

Did you read the book too? The movie to me was OK. Could have improved it in many parts though.

@Chassy and everyone else:

Keep in mind that fitting a whole book into 2(?) hours of film is extremely hard to do, hence the parts that could be improved.

I was just disappointed in the battle scenes. It was all just shaking and then someone is dead. I was expecting the blood cough and everything else.

Also the tracker jackers disappointed me, I thought they were a lot bigger.
[/quote]
It was just because they wanted to keep it at a PG13 rating.[/quote]

Scroll up, I said exactly that, noob! <3

Read full topic
